cast.name: 亚历克·鲍德温 Alec Baldwin

this_title: Thomas and Friends: Races Rescues and Runaways
introduction: Life on the Island of Sodor is never boring - Sometimes when the engines are in trouble, they rely on their friends to Race to theRescue. Watch what happens to Percy when some runaway freight cars cause a near disaster. Cheer on Harold as he comes to the aid of troubled Toby, and help Henry out of a "fishy" situation. Get ready for non-stop excitement!
chinese_title: Thomas and Friends: Races Rescues and Runaways
